EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Steam Power Generation System at Boiler (8.0, 20.5)
Consists of:
• Boiler located at (8.0, 20.5) with connection points at (8.5, 18.5) and (8.5, 22.5)
• Steam engines positioned at (0.5, 9.5), (18.5, 11.5), (1.5, 13.5), (13.5, 14.5), (19.5, 14.5), (22.5, 18.5), (17.5, 20.5), (12.5, 21.5) and (4.5, 23.5)
• One extra steam engine remains in inventory because spatial congestion in the boiler zone prevents its placement

### Automated Mining Setup near (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
• Burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0)
• Burner inserters at positions (-14.5, -52.5) and (-13.5, -52.5)
• Wooden chest at (-13.5, -51.5) for resource buffering

### Smelting Process Cluster
Consists of:
• Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0) producing iron-plate
• Stone furnace at (5.0, 0.0) producing copper-plate
• Associated burner inserters and wooden chests supporting the smelting workflow

### Fluid and Electrical Infrastructure
Consists of:
• Offshore pump at (0.5, 30.5) supplying water into interconnected pipe systems
• Multiple pipe groups (identified by various fluid system IDs) providing stable fluid distribution
• Electricity and belt groups that link production and distribution sites across the map

### Research Lab Network
Consists of:
• Multiple lab units configured for automation research and accepting automation‑science‑packs
• Ongoing connectivity and power issues affect several labs, requiring further intervention

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Extra Steam Engine Placement Issue:
   – The extra steam engine remains unplaceable due to persistent spatial congestion in the boiler zone at (8.0, 20.5), where overlapping burner‑inserters and misaligned transport belts (notably near the (8.5, 22.5) connection area) obstruct placement.
   – Mitigation measures include manually removing or repositioning conflicting entities, redesigning adjoining connection interfaces to enlarge the buildable area, or relocating the extra steam engine to a less congested zone.
